headline: Co-Founder, COO at Eden Farm. Building the leading and trusted Food Service Company in Indonesia.

experiences.title: Co-Founder, COO
experiences.description:
Responsible for the whole Supply Chain in Eden Farm including Commercial, Operation, Distribution and Supply Department. 

Eden Farm is an agrifood-tech supply chain company actively supplying all kinds of food ingredients to B2B customer in Indonesia. We work directly with local producers across the country. We operate in Jabodetabek, West Java, Central Java and East Java.

Founded in 2017, we've dedicated our life to bring food price stability to Indonesia by creating efficient food supply chain between cities. 

#FeedingtheNation has always been our noble goal from the beginning. We believe the more we grow, the more local producers we help.

Kindly contact me at febri@edenfarm.id for any business inquiries and visit our website at www.edenfarm.id
IG: @edenfarm_id

experiences.title: Valuation & Business Modeling - Senior Associate
experiences.description:
Job Descriptions:
+ Contribute technically to valuation & modeling engagement and internal projects
+ Review Excel financial model and prepare reports of findings
+ Design and build business models and produce clear analysis to support client needs
+ Gain thorough understanding of the target business and its market, and of clients’ issues, performing research and analysis of the target’s industry and of quoted companies operating in that sector

Project experiences:
+ Business modeling and valuation on geothermal plant
+ Business modeling and valuation on switching company
+ Valuation and model review on tower telecommunication, bank, oil and gas, data center, plantation company
+ Property valuation review with replacement cost method
+ Due diligence and valuation review on hotel
experiences.location: Indonesia Stock Exchange Building Tower 1, Jl. Jend Sudirman Kav.52-53, Jakarta

experiences.title: Corporate Strategy Analyst
experiences.description:
PT Central Proteina Prima, Tbk (Charoen Pokphand Group) is an integrated shrimp producer and processor and also a market leader in producing fries, shrimp, fish feed and food product. Founded in April 1980 by the Charoen Pokphand Group, CP Prima has grown to become a leading aquaculture company in the world with over 30 years of operating experience in aquaculture industry and was recognized as a global pioneer in large-scale vertically integrated aquaculture operation. Our products include frozen shrimp, frozen food (FIESTA Seafood, CHAMP Seafood, Shifudo), shrimp & fish feed, shrimp fry, probiotics.

Job Descriptions:
+ Assist Group Chairman (owner), CEO, Business Unit Head in various improvements within the group
+ Focus on operational business and financial performance improvement across group's portfolio business including aquaculture, consumer food, bank, multi finance company, logistic, restaurants, communication tower company, coal mining
+ Analyze the key challenges and strengths across business unit to identify the best opportunities for optimization and new businesses development
+ Conduct assessment on new opportunities and company's strategic plans
+ Handle the database and data research to support the analysis and prepare report for management

Project experiences:
+ Business unit growth strategy
+ Integrated strategic plan for business unit
+ Market valuation of business portfolio 
+ Assessment of new business opportunities in aquaculture
+ Market share validation for business unit
+ Financial modeling and business valuation for new business
+ Financial performance benchmarking of bank, multi finance, restaurant, car-rental company
+ Operational improvement in Bank
+ Analysis of consumer finance company and potential partnership on multi finance company
+ Cost efficiency program
+ Hedging analysis of oil prices
+ University business case competition
experiences.location: Wisma GKBI 19th Floor, Jl. Jend. Sudirman No.28, Jakarta
